alert.note: Alert for McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 31 at 1:53AM MDT until March 31 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...McPherson County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM CDT this morning. For the Blizzard Warning, from 7 AM this morning to 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
